snippet: An autopsy report classified the fatal shooting of Renisha McBride in a Detroit suburb as a homicide. Her family believes she was seeking help after an accident when she was shot.
abstract: Autopsy report classifies the fatal shooting of Renisha McBride in a Detroit suburb as a homicide; McBride's death, on property of white homeowner, has sparked protests from civil rights groups.
lead_paragraph: An autopsy report classified the fatal shooting of Renisha McBride in a Detroit suburb as a homicide. Her family believes she was seeking help after an accident when she was shot.

headline.main: Michigan: Autopsy Shows Fatal Wound to the Face
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Autopsy Shows Fatal Wound To the Face
